languages.text: Койку сразу обступают перепуганные младшие офицеры. "Корабль несет огромные потери!", "Связь между отсеками все еще нарушена!", "Команда в ужасе, Лорд-капитан!". Испуганные глаза, окровавленная униформа, согбенные плечи — и эти офицеры сейчас единственная связь для Лорд-капитана с миром за стенами медпалубы! Единственное, чем {mf|он|она} может сейчас поддержать этих людей, готовых рисковать своими жизнями ради корабля...

traits.locale_text: Койку сразу обступают перепуганные младшие офицеры. "Корабль несет огромные потери!", "Связь между отсеками все еще нарушена!", "Команда в ужасе, Лорд-капитан!". Испуганные глаза, окровавленная униформа, согбенные плечи — и эти офицеры сейчас единственная связь для Лорд-капитана с миром за стенами медпалубы! Единственное, чем {mf|он|она} может сейчас поддержать этих людей, готовых рисковать своими жизнями ради корабля...

languages.text: A number of scared junior officers promptly surround the bed. "The ship is suffering devastating losses!" "The interbay comms are still offline!" "The crew is terrified, Lord Captain!" Eyes full of terror, bloodied uniforms, slumped shoulders — and these officers are the only link the Lord Captain currently has to the world outside the medicae deck! All {mf|he|she} can do to support these people who are willing to risk their lives for the ship is...
languages.original_text: Койку сразу обступают перепуганные младшие офицеры. "Корабль несет огромные потери!", "Связь между отсеками все еще нарушена!", "Команда в ужасе, Лорд-капитан!". Испуганные глаза, окровавленная униформа, согбенные плечи — и эти офицеры сейчас единственная связь для Лорд-капитана с миром за стенами медпалубы! Единственное, чем {mf|он|она} может сейчас поддержать этих людей, готовых рисковать своими жизнями ради корабля...

traits.locale_text: A number of scared junior officers promptly surround the bed. "The ship is suffering devastating losses!" "The intermodule comms are still offline!" "The crew is terrified, Lord Captain!" Fear in the eyes, bloodied uniform, slumped shoulders — and these officers are the only link to the world outside the medicae deck that the Lord Captain has right now! All {mf|he|she} can do to support these people who are willing to risk their lives for the ship is...

Eyes full of terror, bloodied uniforms, slumped shoulders — and these officers are the only link the Lord Captain currently has to the world outside the medicae deck! All {mf|he|she} can do to support these people who are willing to risk their lives for the ship is...

languages.text: Un grupo de oficiales de bajo rango atemorizados rodean la cama. «¡La nave está sufriendo daños catastróficos!». «¡Las comunicaciones entre bahías siguen desconectadas!». «¡La tripulación está aterrada, Lord Capitán!». Sus ojos están llenos de terror, sus uniformes están ensangrentados y sus cuerpos encogidos. ¡Y estos oficiales son el único vínculo de{mf|l| la} Lord Capitán con el mundo fuera de la cubierta médica! Lo único que puede hacer para ayudar a quienes arriesgan sus vidas por la nave es...
languages.original_text: A number of scared junior officers promptly surround the bed. "The ship is suffering devastating losses!" "The interbay comms are still offline!" "The crew is terrified, Lord Captain!" Eyes full of terror, bloodied uniforms, slumped shoulders — and these officers are the only link the Lord Captain currently has to the world outside the medicae deck! All {mf|he|she} can do to support these people who are willing to risk their lives for the ship is...

traits.locale_text: Un grupo de oficiales de bajo rango atemorizados rodean la cama. «¡La nave está sufriendo daños catastróficos!». «¡Las comunicaciones entre módulos siguen desconectadas!». «¡La tripulación está aterrada, L{mf|ord|ady} Capit{mf|án|ana}!». Sus ojos están llenos de terror, sus uniformes están ensangrentados y sus cuerpos encogidos. ¡Y estos oficiales son el único vínculo de{mf|l| la} L{mf|ord|ady} Capit{mf|án|ana} con el mundo fuera de la cubierta médica! Lo único que puede hacer para ayudar a quienes arriesgan sus vidas por la nave es...

languages.text: 一群被吓坏的低阶军官迅速围住了舰长的床榻。“飞船正在遭受毁灭性的损害！”“各个区域之间的通讯依然没有恢复！”“船员们都吓坏了，舰长大人！”军官们耷拉着肩膀，眼神中充满惊恐，制服上也沾满了鲜血。他们是领主舰长与医疗甲板之外的区域取得联系的唯一手段！为了鼓舞这些为了舰船甘冒生命危险的人，{mf|他|她}能做的事情是……
languages.original_text: A number of scared junior officers promptly surround the bed. "The ship is suffering devastating losses!" "The interbay comms are still offline!" "The crew is terrified, Lord Captain!" Eyes full of terror, bloodied uniforms, slumped shoulders — and these officers are the only link the Lord Captain currently has to the world outside the medicae deck! All {mf|he|she} can do to support these people who are willing to risk their lives for the ship is...

traits.locale_text: 一群被吓坏的低阶军官迅速围住了舰长的床榻。“飞船正在遭受毁灭性的损害！”“各个区域之间的通讯依然没有恢复！”“船员们都吓坏了，舰长大人！”军官们耷拉着肩膀，眼神中充满惊恐，制服上也沾满了鲜血。他们是领主舰长与医疗甲板之外的区域取得联系的唯一手段！为了鼓舞这些为了舰船甘冒生命危险的人，{mf|他|她}能做的事情是……

languages.text: 怯えた何人もの下級士官が即座にベッドを取り囲む。「船は壊滅的な損害を受けています！」「ベイ間通信が未だにオフラインです！」「クルーが恐れています、ロード・キャプテン！」恐怖に満ちた瞳、血まみれの軍服、沈んだ肩…この士官達こそ、現在ロード・キャプテンとメディケアデッキの外の世界とを繋ぐ唯一の存在だ！ロード・キャプテンが船に命を賭ける思いの人達を支えるするためにできることは…
languages.original_text: A number of scared junior officers promptly surround the bed. "The ship is suffering devastating losses!" "The interbay comms are still offline!" "The crew is terrified, Lord Captain!" Eyes full of terror, bloodied uniforms, slumped shoulders — and these officers are the only link the Lord Captain currently has to the world outside the medicae deck! All {mf|he|she} can do to support these people who are willing to risk their lives for the ship is...

traits.locale_text: 怯えた何人もの下級士官が即座にベッドを取り囲む。「船は壊滅的な損害を受けています！」「ベイ間通信が未だにオフラインです！」「クルーが恐れています、ロード・キャプテン！」恐怖に満ちた瞳、血まみれの軍服、沈んだ肩…この士官達こそ、現在ロード・キャプテンとメディケアデッキの外の世界とを繋ぐ唯一の存在だ！ロード・キャプテンが船に命を賭ける思いの人達を支えるするためにできることは…

languages.text: Mehrere verängstigte junge Offiziere umringen sofort das Bett. "Das Schiff erleidet vernichtende Verluste!" "Die interne Kommunikation ist immer noch offline!" "Die Crew hat große Angst, Lord Captain!" Augen voller Furcht, blutige Uniformen, hängende Schultern – und diese Offiziere sind aktuell die einzige Verbindung des Lord Captains zu der Welt außerhalb des Medicae-Decks! {mf|Seine|Ihre} einzige Möglichkeit, diese Menschen zu unterstützen, die bereit sind, ihr Leben für das Schiff zu riskieren, besteht darin ...
languages.original_text: A number of scared junior officers promptly surround the bed. "The ship is suffering devastating losses!" "The interbay comms are still offline!" "The crew is terrified, Lord Captain!" Eyes full of terror, bloodied uniforms, slumped shoulders — and these officers are the only link the Lord Captain currently has to the world outside the medicae deck! All {mf|he|she} can do to support these people who are willing to risk their lives for the ship is...

languages.text: Sans perdre plus de temps, quelques subalternes apeurés s'approchent du lit. « Le vaisseau a subi des pertes dévastatrices ! » « Les communications interbaies sont toujours coupées ! » « L'équipage est terrifié, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine} ! » Ces officiers sont tous dans le même état : les yeux remplis de terreur, les épaules affaissées, leurs uniformes tachés de sang. Hélas, ils sont aussi le seul lien dont dispose actuellement {name} avec le reste du vaisseau. Tout ce qu'{mf|il|elle} peut faire pour aider ces gens prêts à mettre leur vie en jeu, c'est...
languages.original_text: A number of scared junior officers promptly surround the bed. "The ship is suffering devastating losses!" "The interbay comms are still offline!" All {mf|he|she} can do to support these people who are willing to risk their lives for the ship is...

traits.locale_text: Sans perdre plus de temps, quelques subalternes apeurés s'approchent du lit. « Le vaisseau a subi des pertes dévastatrices ! » « Les communications intermodules sont toujours coupées ! » « L'équipage est terrifié, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine} ! » Ces officiers sont tous dans le même état : les yeux remplis de terreur, les épaules affaissées, leurs uniformes tachés de sang. Hélas, ils sont aussi le seul lien dont dispose actuellement {name} avec le reste du vaisseau. Tout ce qu'{mf|il|elle} peut faire pour aider ces gens prêts à mettre leur vie en jeu, c'est...

languages.text: Birkaç korkmuş astsubay hemen yatağın etrafını sarıyor. "Gemideki kayıplar artıyor!", " Bölmeler arası iletişim hâlâ sağlanamıyor!", "Mürettebat dehşet içinde Lord Kaptan!" Dehşet dolu gözler, kanlı üniformalar, çökmüş omuzlar... Bir de bu subaylar, Lord Kaptan'ın şu anda sıhhiye güvertesi dışındaki dünyayla olan tek bağlantısı! Kendisinin gemi için hayatını riske atmaya hazır bu insanları desteklemek için yapabileceği tek şey...
languages.original_text: A number of scared junior officers promptly surround the bed. "The ship is suffering devastating losses!" "The interbay comms are still offline!" "The crew is terrified, Lord Captain!" Eyes full of terror, bloodied uniforms, slumped shoulders — and these officers are the only link the Lord Captain currently has to the world outside the medicae deck! traits.locale_text: Birtakım korkmuş astsubay hemen yatağın etrafını sarıyor. "Gemideki kayıplar artıyor!", " Bölmeler arası iletişim hâlâ sağlanamıyor!", "Mürettebat dehşete düştü Lord Kaptan!" Dehşet dolu gözler, kanlı üniformalar, çökmüş omuzlar... Bir de bu subaylar, Lord Kaptan'ın şu anda sıhhiye güvertesi dışındaki dünyayla olan tek bağlantısı! Gemi için hayatını riske atmaya hazır bu insanları desteklemek için yapabileceği tek şey...
